revision.text: '''Battle Items''' are common items used throughout gameplay to buff various attributes of the game for a limited time. ==Aquasition== Items can be gained through purchase at shops, by randomly finding them, or by completing dungeons. ==List of Battle Items== {| class="roundtable sortable" style="background: #{{items color light}}; border:3px solid #{{items color dark}}" ! ! Name |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} | [[X Attack]] |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} | [[X Click]] |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} | [[Lucky Egg]] |- | {{Bag3|Token Collector}} | [[Token Collector]] |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} | [[Item Magnet]] |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} | [[Lucky Incense]] |} {{Battle items}}

Name |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} | [[X Attack]] |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} | [[X Click]] |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} | [[Lucky Egg]] |- | {{Bag3|Token Collector}} | [[Token Collector]] |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} | [[Item Magnet]] |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} | [[Lucky Incense]] |} {{Battle items}}

'''Battle Items''' are common items used throughout gameplay to buff various attributes of the game for a limited time.
